com.cornell.opencomm.networking
Class IPAddresses

java.lang.Object
  com.cornell.opencomm.networking.IPAddresses

public class IPAddresses
extends Object

This class will encapsulate all the methods needed to deal with networking issues like acting as a STUN Client and getting the public NAT IP Address, as well as determining all IPs corresponding to local interfaces, etc. For now, this class does not take into account the type of NAT behind which the client sits.

Author:
Abhishek

Constructor Summary
IPAddresses()
          Constructor
 
Method Summary
static void discoverLocalInterfaceIPs()
          Discovers the IPs of this client returned by the local interfaces and initializes local structures to store this information
static void discoverNATedIPs()
          Discovers the public IPs exposed by a NAT, and stores the IPs into local structrues
static Vector<String> getLocalInterfaceIPs()
          Returns the list of all local interface IPs
static Vector<String> getNATedIPs()
          Returns the list of all public NATed IPs
